title: nine inch nails: a million miles away (live 2008) Apple Lossless
description:
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œA Million Miles AwayÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ is my third Nine Inch Nails live compilation, if you look hard enough you can still find A Mix Of All That Was and In This Twilight. AMMA is a collection of one of every song that was played live during the 2008 Lights Over North/South America Tour. I went through every concert that was taped and found what I thought to be the ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œbestÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ performance of each song and mixed them all together to make it sound like one concert. All tracks are FLAC sourced. Please only convert this to mp3 for personal use out of respect to the tapers that were kind enough to record the concerts and share them with all of us. Even though ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œStarfuckersÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ and ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œThe CollectorÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½ were played once or twice there arenÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t any FLAC recordings of them so theyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re not included in this compilation. An updated version of this may come out if those recordings do surface. Most importantly, thanks to the guys in NIN. This compilation is about the band that toured together for all of 2008, maybe the best incarnation of NIN to date.

gladcarrot asked for the concert sources so I put up my best guess of them. When I download a boot I only save the audio and just label them source 1, 2,3,etc.. as they pop up. So I went back through dime and labled the sources that way. I'm not 100% by any means on this so if anyone thinks I labled a source wrong let me know and I'll fix this list.
